00172                 public:
00173                         Transformation(int type) {this->type=type;};

00175                         int getType() const { return type; }
00176                         virtual void apply(Mapping *m, MappingSet **ms) = 0;
00177                         virtual int getComponentIndex() const = 0;
00178                         virtual int getRemovalType() { return -1; };
00179                 protected:
